key_insights: Low Sharpe ratio indicates poor risk-adjusted performance
Low win rate of 0.0% indicates need for entry signal refinement
Profit factor near 1.0 suggests marginal profitability
Low drawdown indicates good capital preservation
Low trading frequency may limit profit potential
recommendations: Consider optimizing entry signals for better performance
Review and adjust Ichimoku parameters using walk-forward analysis
Add confirmation signals to improve entry accuracy
Consider trend strength filters to avoid false signals
Optimize take-profit levels to improve risk/reward ratio
Consider trailing stops to capture larger trends
Validate strategy on out-of-sample data before live trading
Monitor strategy performance and adjust for changing market conditions
